title: dhahabsports
author: dhahabsports
content: -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------* wait until images load, if nothing happened - refresh the page-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Dhahab Sports Token-Utility Token that boosts the soccer market!                                                     Dhahab SportsDhahab Sports has in its executive body professionals graduated inPhysical Education, post-graduated in Sports Training with several othercomplementary courses within the area of sports, bodybuilding andeducational.With 8 years of experience working with players, they have worked invarious roles in clubs such as Fluminense, CFZ, Madureira, América do Riode Janeiro, Bangú among others.Dhahab Sports also has extensive access to Paraguayan teams due to astrong parceri developed during the country's 4 years of football, includingit was there that Dhahab held its first negotiations within football thusstarting a solid network.This intense experience yielded excellent results enabling the creationand development in virtually all clubs of the series A, B, C And D of theBrazilian Championship, which consequently allowed access to clubs thatare in the first, second and third division series of the state championships.Entre the great names and entrepreneurs of world football, Dhahab Sportshas relationship and access to several of them as Giuliano Bertollucci,Carlos Leite, Eduardo Uram, Vagner Ribeiro, Fernando Garcia and JorgeMachado.Talking about the big names and entrepreneurs in soccer world, DhahabSports has relationships and access to several of them, such as GiulianoBertollucci, Carlos Leite, Eduardo Uram, Vagner Ribeiro, Fernando Garciaand Jorge Machado.Among the big ones in soccer who have become success business peopletoo, Dhahab has a close relationship with Luís Fabiano the ''fabulous'',Felipe Ortis former player and current coach of Barcelona’s B Team, DiegoLopes coach of Brescia from Italy , André Pinga idol in the United ArabEmirates, among many other former athletes from Brazil and abroad.Currently one of its executives is a representative of the Swedish clubLinkoping City from Sweden's third division for all of South America. Andnot only that, he has partnership with agents from many countries inEurope, Asia, Africa and so on.Nowadays in order to carry out operations, strengthen relationships andpartnerships within soccer, the directors of Dhahab Sports have traveledto many Brazilian states, Latin American countries and recently theyreturned from a tour in Europe and the Middle East1.0 Please join to Dhahab Sports global group :https://t.me/dhahabsports1.2 .Please join to Dhahab Sports bounty group :https://t.me/airdropdhahabsports1. All participants must join the Dhahab Sports official Telegram Group and Telegram Announcement channel.2. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.3. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming is prohibited. You will be immediately disqualified from the rewards program and all your accounts will be permanently banned.4. Participants cannot change their wallet addresses after registration. Please double check your wallet address before signing up for any campaign.5. The article and Video submission form will be closed 3 days before the end of the award.DHS Token balances will be distributed at the end of the reward program.A week cycle starts on Monday 00:00A week cycle ends on Sunday 23:59 . It’s the last day when you can submit report for that weekSubmit your proof of Campaign Participation by filling out the form, regardless of the campaign you are participating in It is a mandatory option.We will update the Rewards Program once at each Tier.All rights are reserved by the Dhahab Sports team, the Dhahab Sports team can make any changes in the rules or conditions, if any.Please contact Support by Email for technical support during the award campaign. (contato@dhahabsports.com)All reward Tokens will be sent to your BEP-20 wallet within 3 weeks from the end of the Dhahab Sports   IDO sale.A separate report must be published for every week1500000 DHS ($30000000 ) to be divided by the amount of Stake accumulated between participants.1. Twitter Campaign: 20% of the total prize2. Facebook Campaign: 10% of the total reward3. Reddit Campaign: 10% of the total reward4. Discord Campaign: 10% of the total reward5. Telegram Campaign: 15% of the total prize6. Youtube and Tiktok Campaign: 20% of the total prize7. Translation Campaign: 5% of the total prize8. Articles Campaign: 10% of the total prizeThe award program starts on May  25, 2021.The Rewards Program will start at the same time as the IDO sale, and will last 22 weeks in total.[]Week 1 - 06.02.2022 00:00 - 23:59 06.09-2022 - 23:59 Active Week[/url]Week 2 - updatedWeek 3 - updatedWeek 4 - updated Week 5 - updatedWeek 6  - updatedWeek 7 – updatedWeek 8 –updatedWeek 9 – updatedWeek 10 – updatedWeek 11 – updatedWeek 12 – updatedWeek 13 – updatedWeek 14 –updatedWeek 15 – updatedWeek 16 -Week 17 -New week dates will be updated. ...  [/b]You need to divide the shares made within the scope of the campaign into days. Do not share and post all at the same time on the same day. We will not accept this. You can submit your work below this post to track your post.By participating in our rewards program, you agree to these terms.A friend commissioned by our team will Manually check each post from each participant.To participate Under this topic, you need to report in this formatOfficial page on Twitter: https://twitter.com/DhahabSportsReward for the 1st week:1 stake/like + retweet of 3 posts from the Dhahab Sports official page2 stakes/like + retweet of 3 posts from the Dhahab Sports  official page + 2 personal tweets about the Dhahab Sports.Have more than 5001 followers: 5 Stakes / WeekHave more than 10,001 followers: 10 Stakes / Week1. You shall remain subscribed to the official Twitter page https://twitter.com/DhahabSports until the payments are made;2. One Twitter account is allowed per member;3. Your Twitter account shall have at least 200 real followers (Twitter audit shall be above 80%);4. The tweet shall meet the following criteria:? Contain information about the Dhahab Sports  project or the DHS cryptocurrency;? Be accompanied by an image with the Dhahab Sports  logo or other symbols;? Contain hashtags:  ??#DHS #Dhahab Sports  #blockchain #AI #crypto #cryptocurrencies  #BSC? Contain a link to the official site https://dhahabsports.com/? You have to spread your retweets on different days. Your retweets should also contain hashtags #DHS #Dhahab Sports   #blockchain #AI #crypto #cryptocurrencies #BSCThe absence of any of the above items may serve as grounds for non-accrual of stakes.How do I join:Official page on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dhahabsportsReward for the 1st week:1 stake/like + repost of 3 posts from the Dhahab Sports page2 stakes/like + repost of 3 posts from the Dhahab Sports page + 2 personal posts about the Dhahab Sports1. You shall remain subscribed to the official Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/dhahabsportsuntil the payments are made;2. One Facebook account is allowed per member;3. Your Facebook account shall have at least 150 real friends;4. Posts and profile shall be public (open profile is required);5. The post shall meet the following criteria:? Contain information about the Dhahab Sports project or the DHS cryptocurrency;? Be accompanied by an image with the Dhahab Sports logo or other symbols;? Contain hashtags: #DHS #Dhahab Sports #blockchain #AI #crypto #cryptocurrencies  #BSC? Contain a link to the official site https://dhahabsports.com/? Your reposts should also contain hashtags #DHS #Dhahab Sports #blockchain #AI #crypto #cryptocurrencies  #BSCThe absence of any of the above items may serve as grounds for non-accrual of stakes.How do I join:Telegram Campaign Rules:- Join our Dhahab Sports Telegram Group:https://t.me/dhahabsports- Join our Dhahab Sports Telegram Group airdrop bounty:https://t.me/airdropdhahabsportsRules FOR GROUP OWNERS1. Dhahab Sports Project Must be in a fixed message or sent to your Group.2. Your group must have at least 200 REAL members and a category related to cryptocurrencies. Groups with fake / or mandatory members will be disqualified.3. After creating a post on the telegram, please send an email to contato@dhahabsports.com.Awards:Participation: 1 Stake / WeekAvatar + Digital Bureaucracy: 3 Stake/WeekGroups: 5 Stake / WeekHow do I join:Needs to be doneGood Quality: 300 WordsBetter Quality: 500 WordsBest Quality: 1000+ WordsBonuses20-199 views: 5 Stake200-799 views: 10 Stake800 or more views: 25 StakesFollow us on Medium: https://medium.com/@dhahabsportsFollow us on Medium: 1 Stake /WeekRules1. Follow us on Medium: https://medium.com/@dhahabsports2. All content created must be original. Repeating, copying or translation of existing content, including content published by the dhabicoin team, is prohibited and will result in disqualification.3. However, you can use our official images, logos, graphics and other branding materials on our website.4. Articles should be longer than 700 words. SAME or VERY SIMILAR articles submitted to different platforms does not make up its entire quality, only the first one produces the full amount of Stakes, and the 2nd and 3rd ones produce only HALF of its quality.5. The article should contain a link to our website and a link to Whitepaper.6. To prove your authorship, the article or description must include a link to your Bitcointalk profile.7. Steemit, Linkedin etc. free Blog platforms are not allowed. Not:After 10.06.2021  Article sharing in previously accepted free blogs has been closed due to excessive spam and duplicate content. Previous applications will be evaluated according to the old conditions.8. The maximum number of blog posts is 1 posts per month, and should be published on different days.How do I join:Translation Awards:1. ANN IDO:2. BOUNTY: 20 Stakes3. Translate Awards & IDO Topics: 50 Stakes4. Whitepaper Translation: 300 StakesRules:1. Translation must be original and should only be done by the user. Using Google Translate and / or other translation tools is strictly prohibited and will result in disqualification.2. Only constructive posts are counted. Spam and unnecessary posts do not count. Spammers will be disqualified.3. Only ONE translation will be accepted per person. Applications for more than one translation / language will not be accepted.4. Only the best for each translation language will be awarded.5. Participants are required to register first and then send your completed translation to our report form within 21 days of registration and your application should not be until 15 December. Late submissions will not be accepted.6. If you have any questions about the translation award, please contact support: (contato@dhahabsports.com)How do I join:WHEN YOUR NAME IS MARKED GREEN, YOU CAN START TRANSLATIONProject Announcement: ANN ICO:BOUNTY: WE WILL SELECT ONLY 1 EXHIBITOR IN EACH LANGUAGE. PLEASE REGISTER BEFORE YOU BEGIN TRANSLATION.Youtube & Tiktok AwardsThe Dhahab Sports team is looking for talented people who can shoot and upload original and educational YouTube videos about the dhabicoin and the DHS Dhahab Sports.1. Only high-quality unique content is accepted for participation.2. Videos, the content of which duplicates the information from our official website, White Paper, Roadmap or other documents will not be considered and will not be subject to reward.3. Your content shall be unique. Any suspicion of plagiarism will be suppressed, and authors will be excluded from the list of participants.4. Videos shall be in English, Turkish, Dutch, German only.5. The video shall be posted on YouTube and have at least 200 views at the time of submission.6. The video shall be shot in high-quality resolution (at least FulHD) and be accompanied by high-quality voice-over without interference and extraneous sounds.6. 6. Video requirements:Not less than 5 minutes;Not less than 2 images with Dhahab Sports logo or other symbols;The video description shall contain the links:Website: https://dhahabsports.comTelegram: https://t.me/dhahabsportsThe title and description shall contain  Dhahab Sports;7. Negative or ambiguous statements about the  Dhahab Sports .8. The video shall be unique and interesting, shot (narrated) in the first person and contain a story about the user’s experience.9. It is forbidden to speak unconstructively, negatively or ambiguously about the  dhabicoin project, about users or bounty participants.10. Incitement to hatred, racism, religious or personal attacks is prohibited. Content shall be respectful and polite in all senses.11. The video shall remain available until the payments are made.12. Suggested (recommended) topics for videos:12.1. My impression (my review) of the experience of using the  Dhahab Sports.12.2. My impression (my review) of the experience of investing in the DHS Token.12.3. My impression (my review) of the possibility of earning money using the DHS Token.12.4. My vision of the  Dhahab Sports development prospects.13. The reward will be agreed depending on the quality of the content:1 stake - satisfactory/week5 stakes - good/week20 stakes - excellent/week14. Videos from accounts with negative credibility are not accepted for participation in the bounty.15. During the bounty campaign 1 (one) participant can submit only 1 (one) work.You can submit your application for creative Animation videos explaining  dhabicoin and DHS Token.How do I join:
